text.tspan: most promising future use of AI:
● Increase free time for humans to complete other tasks
● Assist in the development for change and potential risks
● Improve functionality of basic services (e.g. healthcare, education)
● Improve safety by completing dangerous tasks for humans
● Reduce crime and monitor illegal behaviours
● Aid in disaster/emergency prediction, management, planning and operations
● Provide support to citizens in need
● Infrastructure management (e.g. electric, gas, road, sewerage, stormwater, telecomm, water)

flowRoot.flowPara: ● monitor urban areas and ensure safety and security of residents
● reduce public sector costs with savings to improve other urban services
● reduce public sector costs with savings used to reduce rates and other taxes
● free up resources so that local governments can spend more time focusing on resident needs and concerns
● improve objectivity in the delivery of urban services
● monitor and respond to problems associated with urban infrastructure
● monitor and respond to the environmental and climate crises
需要高级人脑思维但人又不屑於去做的东西：
